item.description:

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：一年前，瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）倒在了本地竞争对手的怀抱中。瑞银拿走了最好的部分，而投资银行丛林中的其他猛兽则瓜分了它的尸体。@peter_tl 不禁要问，没有了反复无常的竞争对手，幸存者是否会有所收敛 #BVTV
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Credit Suisse collapsed into the arms of its local rival a year ago. While UBS took the best bits, other beasts of the investment banking jungle carved up the carcass. @peter_tl wonders if survivors will be restrained without an erratic competitor #BVTV pic.twitter.com/HIiRjGonGk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国1-2月份的工厂产出和零售销售均好于预期，标志着2024年的稳健开局，即使房地产行业的疲软仍然拖累着经济和信心，但这也为政策制定者提供了一些宽慰。
item.description:
WATCH: China's factory output and retail sales beat expectations in the January-February period, marking a solid start for 2024 and offering some relief to policymakers even as weakness in the property sector remains a drag on the economy and confidence https://t.co/2WHHBNJfO9 pic.twitter.com/TseJ9mpTuW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024
